name: SpaceSpace 2
description:
You start inside a spaceship, you can start the mission and fly in different points of the space with the hyperspeed or train to the main mission with the training machines.

Mission objective is to beat the boss. To do it, you have to visit the different location on the map and win health for the ship.

Minigames are based on classic space  arcade genre.

You can also make your level and play it with a level editor machine.

To pilot the ship is not easy, as in space there is not air brake effect, so you have to learn to control the ship in the void,
